links.*: The Lost Road and Other Writings

wikitext.*:
'''BARÁS''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] given no signification, except from what can be determined from its derivatives. The root is said to be "only found in [[Noldorin]]".<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 351 (root appearing as "BARÁS-"; the "á" in PQ ''barasá'' also has a [[Wikipedia:macron|macron]])</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''barasá'' ("hot, burning")<ref name=Ety/>
**[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]]: ''barasa'', ''baraha'' ("hot, burning")<ref name=Ety/>
**[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]]: ''[[bara]]''<ref name=Ety/>

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''b’rás-sē'' ("heat")<ref name=Ety/>
**[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]]: ''brasse'' ("white heat")<ref name=Ety/>
**[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]]: ''brass'', ''[[brassen]]''<ref name=Ety/>
